title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2051/94 of 12 August 1994 fixing, for the 1994/95 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2051/94 of 12 August 1994 fixing, for the 1994/95 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The threshold price for broken rice is hereby fixed at ECU 276,88 per tonne.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 August 1994.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 166, 25. 6. 1976, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 197, 30. 7. 1994, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 156, 14. 6. 1978, p. 14.
(4) OJ No 204, 24. 8. 1967, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 202, 27. 7. 1988, p. 41.
